=========
 rhizome
=========

in biology, a rhizome is a root that also doubles as a strategy for
reproduction. in philosophy, Carl Jung and other use rhizome as a
metaphor to describe the underground connections of life.  Social
scientist describe non-hierarchical self organizing social groups like
"Critical Mass" as "rhizomal".

rhizome is the root for yucca.


Overview
--------

rhizome is a generalized rdf catalog with apis for merging and
searching.

dependencies
------------

* zope.component
* zope.interface
* zope.configuration
* zope.app.intid
* zope.app.keyreference
* ZODB
* rdflib(michel-events branch)
* Five 1.4(for use in zope2)
